sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: REFECTION , among eccleſiaſtics, a ſpare meal or repaſt, juſt ſufficing for the ſupport of life : hence the hall in convents, and other communities, where the monks, nuns, &c. take their refections or meals in com-mon, is called the refectory.
